channel.title: A file that sets your EV and runs the client
channel.description:
How would I go about making a .cmd file that once the person runs, it checks what jdk he has and/or sets his EV for him, then changed the run.bat file to the jdk he has?
eg. he has jdk 1.6.0_22 and in my run.bat it has "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe", and then he runs and changes it to "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\java.exe" ??

item.title: A file that sets your EV and runs the client
